messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN YORK OUTER
messages.content: Julian was born and bred in Yorkshire and, like all good Yorkshiremen, calls a spade a spade. He has a proven track record for getting things done and is determined to fight a positive campaign on issues that matter to residents.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FIGHTING TO PROTECT OUR GREEN BELT
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Julian has continually campaigned to protect their Green Belt around York against this Government's unsustainable 'local housing targets'. He supports the protection of our green belt.
Julian supported the local post office campaign and presented a petition in support of post offices to Downing Street.
Julian has campaigned strongly and passionately for improved health services in York, specifically against proposed cutbacks.

issues.health: Julian has always campaigned strongly and passionately for improved health services in York.

housing.content: Julian has continually campaigned to protect their Green Belt around York against this Government's unsustainable 'local housing targets'.

images.caption: LEFT: FIGHTING TO PROTECT OUR GREEN BELT
ABOVE: CAMPAIGNING FOR A FAIR DEAL ON TRANSPORT
